issue.title: The original upstream tarball should not be altered directly.

content.raw: BTW, of course gbp-pq is git only! I am not aware of any Mercurial equivalent... Especially for release repository, I would recommend switching to Git (GitHub?) as you may be able then to take advantage of these tools.
